      • plus

        public Matrix3 plus(Matrix3 B)
        Matrix addition C=A+B. Do not modify this Matrix (A), this Matrix and return C a newly created Matrix.
        Parameters:
        B - the Matrix to be added
        Returns:
        C, a new Matrix, sum of this Matrix (A) and B Matrix
